column1: If you haven't already created any account
column2: you will need to establish a SenangPay account.

column1: To start we will need the information as below. These can be retrieve in senangPay Dashboard.
2. Refer to Shopping Cart Integration Link section. Get your Merchant ID and Secret Key information.
3. Then you will need to fill in the return URL. This is the URL where senangPay will redirect the buyer after the payment has been processed.

column2: you need to fill the Callback URL. Callback URL is used as alternative notification to merchant shopping cart in case there is a breakdown in transaction flow. For more info on Callback URL
